parameters.name: ArcRadius
parameters.description: Radius for the circular sketch pattern

parameters.name: ArcAngle
parameters.description: Angle relative to the sketch entities being patterned

parameters.name: PatternNum
parameters.description: Total number of instances, including the seed geometry

parameters.name: PatternRotate
parameters.description: True to rotate the pattern, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete, passed as a string formatted as: "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

parameters.name: RadiusDim
parameters.description: True to display the radius dimension in the graphics area, false to not

parameters.name: AngleDim
parameters.description: True to display the angle dimension in the graphics area, false to not

parameters.name: CreateNumOfInstancesDim
parameters.description: True to display the number of instances dimension in the graphics area, false to not

title: ISketchManager.CreateCircularSketchStepAndRepeat
signature:
System.Boolean CreateCircularSketchStepAndRepeat( 
   System.Double
ArcRadius
,
   System.Double
ArcAngle
,
   System.Int32
PatternNum
,
   System.Double
PatternSpacing
,
   System.Boolean
PatternRotate
,
   System.String
DeleteInstances
,
   System.Boolean
RadiusDim
,
   System.Boolean
AngleDim
,
   System.Boolean
CreateNumOfInstancesDim
)

parameters.name: ArcRadius
parameters.description: Radius for the circular sketch pattern

parameters.name: ArcAngle
parameters.description: Angle relative to the sketch entities being patterned

parameters.name: PatternNum
parameters.description: Total number of instances, including the seed geometry

parameters.name: PatternRotate
parameters.description: True to rotate the pattern, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete, passed as a string formatted as: "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

parameters.name: RadiusDim
parameters.description: True to display the radius dimension in the graphics area, false to not

parameters.name: AngleDim
parameters.description: True to display the angle dimension in the graphics area, false to not

parameters.name: CreateNumOfInstancesDim
parameters.description: True to display the number of instances dimension in the graphics area, false to not

returns: True if the circular sketch is created, false if not
remarks: The radius, angle, and number of instances dimensions displayed in the graphics area can be modified by interactive users.
